short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables the Perfetto trace viewer (https://ui.perfetto.dev) to record Chrome browser traces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides the capability to start and stop Chrome performance traces from the Perfetto trace viewer UI.

Requires Chrome M81 to function correctly.

By installing this item, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy at https://www.google.com/intl/en/policies/.
